meta_keywords: 1569-1622) A pair of portraits of Rudolph I of Germany (1218-1291) and Gertrude of Hohenberg (c.1225-1281)
he wearing flowered green doublet with gold buttons and embroidery and a white lace ruff
she wearing black dress with white lace ruff
her brown hair upswept beneath a black hat with plaited band
